name: Wasteland Socialist Authority
uniques: Gain a free [Communist Cooperative] [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
quote: Idle boast the strong pass is a wall of iron, With firm strides we are crossing its summit.

civilopediaText.text: Idle boast the strong pass is a wall of iron, With firm strides we are crossing its summit.

name: Communist Cooperative
uniques: [25]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: Estabilishing a basis for common ownership.
Slavers turn people into the walking dead, our new society will remind them what it means to be people.

name: Global Liberation Command
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
New [Military] units start with [15] Experience [in all cities]
All newly-trained [relevant] units [in this city] receive the [Reconnaissance III] promotion
Only available <if [Search for Survivors] is constructed>
Only available <in cities without a [Strengthened Mass Line]>
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: The wasteland is filled with the worst of human scum: slavers, exploiters, raiders. It's time to shed a light upon this dark age.

name: Strengthened Mass Line
uniques: [+5]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
Only available <if [Search for Survivors] is constructed>
Only available <in cities without a [Global Liberation Command]>
Destroyed when the city is captured

civilopediaText.text: By focusing on unity, we shall stand as a new lighthouse for the working class.
